scripts.install: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then cd Brass-Mart-UI && npm install; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then cd Brass-Mart-API && npm install; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.build: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then cd Brass-Mart-UI && npm run build; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then cd Brass-Mart-API && npm install && npm run build; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then cd Brass-Mart-UI && npm run build; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then cd Brass-Mart-API && npm run postinstall; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.deploy: keystone build && keystone prisma migrate deploy
